copyright.description: A copyright message suitable for display to credit the content creator.

generator.description: Tool that generated this glTF model.  Useful for debugging.

premultipliedAlpha.description: Specifies if the shaders were generated with premultiplied alpha.  WebGL: see getContext() with premultipliedAlpha

profile.description: Specifies the target rendering API and version, e.g., WebGL 1.0.2.
